name: EGG (InkedSplat)
description:
EGG is a game about balancing your best friend on your finger and not letting him die, fun for the whole family!

you can throw your friend up in the air like the greatest gymnast to jump over bullets or collect coins to gain points. All this to some funky tunes (if you get far enough, it takes like 20s to get to the juicy part, but I believe in you)

make sure to read the manual before playing.

made for Ludum Dare 46, theme: Keep It Alive
